gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.io
Class FormatWriterParams

java.lang.Object
  gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.io.FormatWriterParams

public class FormatWriterParams
extends java.lang.Object

Format Writer Profile Object. Used to initialize writers with implementation specific properties (e.g. compression level).

Author:
Ryan Chute
